position: IIT Kharagpur'22 | Aspire | Gokwik | Fashinza | CityMall | Apna

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: 1) Implemented seamless dump mechanism of raw analytics data from Redshiftwarehouse to Postgres DB using lambda function and BLOB storage.2)Streamlined deployment and slashed costs by merging two separate dashboardservices into one codebase, eliminating complexity and bottlenecks.3) Implemented a Report Generation Service capable of extracting transactionaldata from specific modules, enabling scheduled triggering at fixed intervals.4) Innovated scalable discount service overcoming Shopify’s coupon generationlimits, enabling seamless discount management for enhanced sales strategies.5) Automated onboarding workflow for the new merchant that includes apayment gateway, subscription, eKYC, and installing required apps

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: 1) Redesigned various DB models to improve latency and throughput.2) Worked on the abstraction layer of various APIs and their interfaces between DB models.3) Build a platform to update data between the Logistics Dashboard and Orders page.4) Used event driven services & cronjobs to sync data between Courier platform and dashboard.5) Integrated multiple 3rd party applications to Implement accurate data flow between environments
experience.description_html: 1) Redesigned various DB models to improve latency and throughput.2) Worked on the abstraction layer of various APIs and their interfaces between DB models.3) Build a platform to update data between the Logistics Dashboard and Orders page.4) Used event driven services & cronjobs to sync data between Courier platform and dashboard.5) Integrated multiple 3rd party applications to Implement accurate data flow between environments <!---->

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: At apna, I have worked on reshaping the product and contributed to the development lifecycle. I added various filtering and sorting techniques to the Job Search system and written automated Test cases for the same. Moving to next I have also improved the platform by configuring fallbacks for better User satisfaction. I have contributed to re architecturing various existing backend APIs for the smooth and robust working of the application. I have made some important migrations in the Database. My most recent contribution was configuring the Recommendation System that works during the onboarding of new users to Apna’s platform. Along with these, I have worked on building a retooling Dashboard.
experience.description_html: At apna, I have worked on reshaping the product and contributed to the development lifecycle. I added various filtering and sorting techniques to the Job Search system and written automated Test cases for the same. Moving to next I have also improved the platform by configuring fallbacks for better User satisfaction. I have contributed to re architecturing various existing backend APIs for the smooth and robust working of the application. I have made some important migrations in the Database. My most recent contribution was configuring the Recommendation System that works during the onboarding of new users to Apna’s platform. Along with these, I have worked on building a retooling Dashboard.

experience.title: Computer Vision Internship
experience.description: ● Infected RBC's detection using Morphological Transformations and watershed algorithm OpenCV.● Development of Automatic segmentation and counting of WBC's, RBC's, and platelets from the blood.● Development of an RGB filter for visualizing and modifying the red, green, and blue channels of a selected area of an image by changing Colorspace to HSV, splitting channels and threshold
